item.title: Documentation
item.description: Edge computing brings computing resources to where they are needed the most. The MobiledgeX Edge-Cloud Platform helps Mobile Network Operators build their own edge clouds and generate new revenue while giving developers a platform to run their apps utilizing the telco edge infrastructure.
